Nakivo

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


Nakivo

Overview

External Zabbix Script with discovery rule for nakivo backups

Author

Michael Weber

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Nakivo Jobs|<p>-</p>|External check|nakivo.pl[{HOST.CONN},”–job-list”]<p>Update: 60m</p>|

Items collected

|Name|Description|Type|Key and additional info| |—-|———–|—-|—-| |Job[{#NAME}] State|<p>-</p>|External check|nakivo.pl[{HOST.CONN},”–job-info”, “{#ID}”,”2”]<p>Update: 5m</p><p>LLD</p>| |Job[{#NAME}] Last Result|<p>-</p>|External check|nakivo.pl[{HOST.CONN},”–job-info”, “{#ID}”,”3”]<p>Update: 5m</p><p>LLD</p>|

Triggers

Name Description Expression Priority
Job[{#NAME}] failed <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Nakivo:nakivo.pl[UNKNOWN,”–job-info”, “{#ID}”,”3”].iregexp(^successful$)}=0</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
Job[{#NAME}] failed (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Nakivo:nakivo.pl[UNKNOWN,”–job-info”, “{#ID}”,”3”].iregexp(^successful$)}=0</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
